title: Scottish Rugby Union font...what is it?
content:
I'm looking for the name of the font, or a font very similar to, the one used by the Scottish Rugby Union on the backs of their shirts. It looks like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/610x_4136.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/77221311_3662.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/77221351_5726.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/77221362_6001.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/81487469_4249.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110325000642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/81523593_6363.jpg)

Sorry for the big pictures, but you get what I'm looking for....

Any help would be much appreciated
author: redbowl
